titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the collegiat church of S. Peter in Westminster, the sixth of April. 1628 Before the Right Honourable the Lords of the higher house of Parliament. By Iohn, Lord Bishop of Lincolne, and Deane of the said collegiat church. Set forth by their Lordships appointment.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1582-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Bill, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiesty,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
